thread.section_title: Ashburn Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good indeed
thread.title_full: Very good indeed - Review of Ashburn Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: alibaba105
title: Very good indeed
text:
Wanted a London Central hotel before flying out from Heathrow following day.
After staying in many different hotels over the years,we found the Ashburn to be excellent.The room was the quietest room I have ever had in London.
Elvira on reception was very pleasant.
Will definitely stay here again.
